categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker actors

nodes.text: Lukaz Leong is a an actor and stunt performer who portrayed the Knight of Ren Ap'lek in the 2019 film Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker. He also served as a stunt performer for the movies Solo: A Star Wars Story and Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi, served as the stunt double for Donnie Yen in the anthology film Rogue One: A Star Wars Story and played Luke Skywalker in a flashback for Episode IX.

Leong served as a stunt double for Ludi Lin in the Black Mirror episode "Striking Vipers", and for Hiroyuki Sanada in the 2017 horror film Life. His other stunt credits include a long list of well-known titles such as the movies Fast & Furious Presents: Hobbs & Shaw, Maleficent: Mistress of Evil, Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald, Doctor Strange, Now You See Me 2 and Avengers: Age of Ultron.
